data.text:
@dizeimage @priceline Hey Trina, so sorry for the trouble. Were you able to speak to an agent already regarding the seating? If we may still help, pls send your info in DM:

https://t.co/6iDGBJAc2m

@Gladgirl720 @Delta @priceline This is the first time they have ever done this. Not to mention Medallion & comfort status are packed like sardines too. $800 to be packed in just to sip cheap wine & eat. Give me a break.

& @Delta stop saying  “you booked with a third party” as an excuse. Either STOP allowing bookings with a “third party” or stop making us wait 2 hours to book a flight. You still get paid by the third party, so handle your business. Or I will continue flying with @AmericanAir

@dizeimage @Delta We'd like to review your case and see what we can do. Please send us a
DM with your trip number (or email + full name). ^JD
